question.text: The transforming principle in Griffith's experiment was established

options.text: when live S-strain of S.pneumoniae were injected in mice.
when live R-strain of S.pneumoniae were injected in mice.
when heat-killed R-strain of S.pneumoniae were injected in mice.
when heat-killed S-strain of S.pneumonia were injected with R-strain in mice.

solution.text: When heat-killed S-strain of S.pneumonia were injected with living R-strain in mice than the mice died and from those dead mice living S-strain was isolated, indicating that some chemical substance of heat killed S-strain caused transformation of R - strain into S-strain and resulted in dead of mice.
